trans-unit.source: Add Push Notifications to App (iOS) | .NET Backend
trans-unit.target: Add Push Notifications to App (iOS) | .NET Backend

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Azure Mobile Services to send push notifications to your iOS app.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Azure Mobile Services to send push notifications to your iOS app.

trans-unit.source: Add Push Notifications to iOS App and .NET Backend
trans-unit.target: Add Push Notifications to iOS App and .NET Backend

trans-unit.source: This topic shows you how to add push notifications to the [quickstart project](mobile-services-dotnet-backend-ios-get-started.md), so that your mobile service sends a push notification each time a record is inserted.
trans-unit.target: This topic shows you how to add push notifications to the [quickstart project](mobile-services-dotnet-backend-ios-get-started.md), so that your mobile service sends a push notification each time a record is inserted.

trans-unit.source: You must complete [Get Started with Mobile Services] first.
trans-unit.target: You must complete [Get Started with Mobile Services] first.

trans-unit.source: Configure Azure to Send Push Notifications
trans-unit.target: Configure Azure to Send Push Notifications

trans-unit.source: Update Backend Code to Send Push Notifications
trans-unit.target: Update Backend Code to Send Push Notifications

trans-unit.source: Open Visual Studio project > **Controllers** folder > **TodoItemController.cs** > method `PostTodoItem`.
trans-unit.target: Open Visual Studio project > **Controllers** folder > **TodoItemController.cs** > method `PostTodoItem`.

trans-unit.source: Replace the method with the following.
trans-unit.target: Replace the method with the following.

trans-unit.source: When a todo item is inserted, this code sends out a push notification with the item text.
trans-unit.target: When a todo item is inserted, this code sends out a push notification with the item text.

trans-unit.source: If there's an error, the code adds an error log entry that is viewable via the logs section of the portal.
trans-unit.target: If there's an error, the code adds an error log entry that is viewable via the logs section of the portal.
